explains: v. 给……穿衣；为……提供衣服；赋予（某人某品质）

sentences.en: They clothe their children in the latest fashions.
sentences.cn: 他们给他们的孩子穿最时髦的服装。

sentences.en: She was on her own with two kids to feed and clothe.
sentences.cn: 她自己一个人要招呼两个孩子的衣食。

sentences.en: She has to work hard to feed and clothe her family.
sentences.cn: 为了使家人有吃有穿，她不得不勤奋地工作。
